price: “O narode moj”, govorio im je on, “zašto tražite da vas stigne kazna prije nego što se pokajete? Zašto od Allaha ne tražite oprosta da bi vam se ukazala milost?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi lima tastaʿjilūna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati lawlā tastaghfirūna al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
